title: Socialist Standard - December 2007
description:
Socialist Standard magazine December 2007 - main theme Global Warming.

contents include : 
&#039;Editorial : Workers have no country&#039;, &#039;Pathfinders&#039; (&#039;popular science&#039;), &#039;Global warming ? what is it?&#039;, &#039;The Politics of climate change&#039;, &#039;Saving earth or saving profits?&#039;, &#039;Respect in Retrospect&#039; (UK Left), &#039;Booms and slums&#039;, &#039;Connecting the dots&#039;, plus letters, reviews - &#039;How to make opportunity equal&#039;; &#039;UFO Religion&#039;, &#039;Thinking Allowed&#039; &#039;Sicko&#039;, - &#039;50 Years Ago - Sputnik lunacy&#039;, &#039;Greasy Pole - UK politics&#039;, etc.
